properties:
  - name: InstanceAdornment.Adornee
    summary: |
      Which Class.Instance to adorn.
    description: |
      Since adornments are usually parented to some GUI, this property
      determines which Class.Instance they are adorning. They render in 3D
      positioned relative to the "adornee", not to their parent.
